explains: v. 摆动；鼓翼；忙乱（flutter 的现在分词）
wordGroup: have a flutter [口语](在证券交易市场或赛马场)参加小赌

sentences.en: I could feel a fluttering pulse.
Her chiffon skirt was fluttering in the night breeze.
sentences.cn: 她的薄绸裙在晚风中飘动。

sentences.en: Her heart fluttering like hummingbird wings in the cave of her chest.
sentences.cn: 她的心剧烈地跳动着，如同蜂鸟的羽翼在她胸腔中颤动不停。
